hexes.description: Dorrin — Rockwinder village on Mount Arbora's western slopes.
NW coast — Coastal Divers' Lodge North, Water Clock, and Pixie Boat anchorage.
Mineral-rich earth in vivid reds and yellows. Hot air shimmers.
Upper slopes of Mount Arbora. Jumaga's Roost and the Ledge of Offering.
Chisuay's Teahouse — elegant teahouse run by a dashing oni sorcerer.
Windswept grassland — the Gale Fields stretch endlessly.
Lom & Salt's College of Arms — training grounds on the hillside.
Rocky cliff faces and narrow ledges.
Toggle — smithing hamlet on Mount Arbora's eastern slope. Opu Opu Spring nearby.
Entrance to a long-forgotten mine. Gem-encrusted caverns below.
Coastal Divers' Lodge East — NE coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.
Uluwa / Ferry Crossing — the Spirit Market, a twilight bazaar.
Matango Village — mushroom-obsessed village. Five fungal factions.
Rolling grassland under a wide sky. Wind never stops.
The Graysteps — grey stone village on Mount Arbora's western slope.
Windswept grassland — the Gale Fields stretch endlessly.
Swampy lowland. Stilts would be wise here.
Brackish water pools between twisted mangroves.
Sheep Dragon Grazing Grounds — pastoral meadows in the western forest.
Wooded hills — wilderness between western settlements.
The Way Gate & Amak Shurak — ancient waypoint at the island's crossroads.
Rolling foothills — wilderness between mountains and wetlands.
Corrupted wetland — dark tendrils creep through the muck.
Soggy wetland — mist clings to the ground.
Ten Wheels Grove — ancient grove in Brackwater Wetlands.
Polewater Village & The Sally Sue — stilts village, closest to Corruption.
Coastal Divers' Lodge West — western coast outpost.
Okiri Village — quiet farming hamlet with shepherds and slingers.
Fort Harglo — Courier Brigade fortress at the crossroads.
Witching Tower — Fish Head Coven compound with four Gatehouses.
North & East Gatehouse area — Witching Tower outer defenses.
River Master's Tower — overlooks the eastern rivers.
Brackish water pools between twisted mangroves.
Soggy wetland — mist clings to the ground.
Crak Caves — cave system in the western hills.
SW interior wilderness — scrubby hills and goat paths.
South Gatehouse & West Gatehouse area — southern Witching Tower defenses.
Opal Falls — cascading waterfalls from the highland plateau.
Broken Bird Airfield — First Age airfield ruins.
Crumbled Hut — mysterious ruins in the Coastal Highlands.
Muddy wetland — the air smells of decay and salt.
Tidewater — sandy coastal village. Tower of Glass holds the Pearl of Rongol.
Lake Ellior area — forested lowlands around a shimmering lake.
Lake Ellior — the ancient Temple of Shoom rises from the depths.
Southern fields — open grassland approaching the coast.
AHA Headquarters — observatory and research campus.
Yatamon — largest city on Obojima. Spirit trolleys, undercity below.
Coastal Divers' Lodge South — southern coast outpost.
Barren slope near a bubbling hot spring.
Rocky hills rising and falling in gentle waves.
Barren slope near a bubbling hot spring.
Sweeping plain of tall grass. Courier Brigade road markers visible.
Grassy hillside with good vantage points.
Open plain with grass tall enough to hide a standing person.
Rolling grassland under a wide sky. Wind never stops.
Rolling hills with scattered boulders.
Gentle hills — worn paths between ridgelines.
High mountain pass between jagged peaks.
Rocky cliff faces and narrow ledges.
Rocky hills rising and falling in gentle waves.
Vast grasslands — uncommonly tall grass sways in constant wind.
Old-growth forest — moss-covered trunks and ferns.

The peak of Mount Arbora. Deep within lies the Prison of Oghmai.

Old-growth forest — moss-covered trunks and ferns.
Deep woods — dappled light on the forest floor.
Thick forest — birdsong and rustling leaves.
Ancient trees crowd together, branches interlocking overhead.

Sunken Town & Underwater Depot — Submerged ruins north of the island.
The Coral Castle — Lionfish King's underwater fortress.
Sally Sue — Beached 100-foot shipwreck buried in sand and tree limbs on a debris-strewn beach, ~1 mile north of Polewater.

locations.name: Dorrin
locations.description: Village of Rockwinders on Mount Arbora's western slopes. Guides and traders.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (North)
locations.description: NW coast outpost. Water Clock and Pixie Boat nearby.

locations.name: Sky Kite Valley
locations.description: Second largest settlement. Enormous kites, barges, aeronauts.

locations.name: Jumaga's Roost
locations.description: Climbing settlement near the elder sky salamander's lair.

locations.name: Chisuay's Teahouse
locations.description: Elegant teahouse run by an oni sorcerer. Awakened fossa staff.

locations.name: Kuroki Village
locations.description: Forest village near the mountain.

locations.name: Hogstone Hot Springs
locations.description: Healing hamlet around natural hot springs.

locations.name: Toggle
locations.description: Smithing hamlet. Dara masters forge unique alloys. Opu Opu Spring nearby.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (East)
locations.description: NE coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.

locations.name: Uluwa (Spirit Market)
locations.description: Twilight bazaar where spirits and mortals trade. Ferry Crossing.

locations.name: Matango Village
locations.description: Mushroom village. Five fungal factions compete for Truffle Prince.

locations.name: The Graysteps
locations.description: Grey stone village on Mount Arbora's western slope.

locations.name: Goodie Mart
locations.description: Provisions outpost at the Brackwater edge. Subway station.

locations.name: Gobo Village
locations.description: Eastern forest settlement.

locations.name: Roa Kala
locations.description: Sacred grove of the Kohdoi dara.

locations.name: Hakumon's Ramen Shop
locations.description: Legendary ramen in the wetlands. Oni chef.

locations.name: Polewater Village
locations.description: Stilts village in Brackwater. Closest to the Corruption. Sally Sue nearby.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (West)
locations.description: Western coast outpost of the Mariners' Guild.

locations.name: Okiri Village
locations.description: Quiet farming hamlet. Shepherds, slingers, Miss Lindley fixes anything.

locations.name: Fort Harglo
locations.description: Courier Brigade fortress at the crossroads.

locations.name: Witching Tower (Fish Head Coven)
locations.description: Fish Head Coven compound. Council of Three and Thirty. Four Gatehouses.

locations.name: Ekmu Village
locations.description: Settlement at the eastern forest edge.

locations.name: Opal Falls
locations.description: Cascading waterfalls from the highland plateau.

locations.name: Broken Bird Airfield
locations.description: First Age airfield ruins. Spirit Plitsu guards.

locations.name: Tidewater
locations.description: Sandy coastal village. Tower of Glass holds the Pearl of Rongol.

locations.name: AHA Headquarters
locations.description: Observatory and research campus. The Asloh triumvirate.

locations.name: Yatamon
locations.description: Largest city on Obojima. Spirit trolleys, detective agencies, undercity.

locations.name: Coastal Divers' Lodge (South)
locations.description: Southern coast outpost.

locations.name: Sunken Town & Underwater Depot
locations.description: Submerged ruins north of the island.

locations.name: The Coral Castle
locations.description: Lionfish King's underwater fortress.

locations.name: Crak Caves
locations.description: Cave system in the western hills.

locations.name: Temple of Shoom
locations.description: Ancient nakudama ziggurat. Midwives above, Voraro feeds below.

locations.name: Glittering Depot
locations.description: A long-forgotten mine near Toggle. Center of a tunnel maze with gem-encrusted caverns and monster lairs.

locations.name: Prison of Oghmai
locations.description: Deep within Mount Arbora. Holds Oghmai, demon emperor of the nakudama, imprisoned since the Second Age.

locations.name: Salty Sue
locations.description: Beached 100-foot shipwreck buried in sand and tree limbs on a debris-strewn beach, ~1 mile north of Polewater.

locations.name: Amak Shurak
locations.description: A homebrew village on the Gale Fields plains.

locations.name: Island of Hmug
locations.description: Hmug is an island far offshore of the Land of Hot Water. Some passages lead to gem-encrusted caverns, others to the surface, and others to monster lairs.

locations.name: Master Chen's Water Clock
locations.description: A giant tower built in the Shallows outside Sky Kite Valley. The current once turned a wheel that ran a very precise clock. Since the earthquake, the current has slowed dramatically and the clock has ceased to keep time.

locations.name: The Way Gate
locations.description: An ancient gate marking a passage through the mountains.

locations.name: Lom and Salt's College of Arms
locations.description: A college of arms, training warriors and scholars.

locations.name: Ten Wheels Grove
locations.description: A grove marked by ten ancient wooden wheels.

locations.name: Toraf & Boulder's School
locations.description: A school run by Torf and Bolder.

locations.name: Crumpled Hut
locations.description: A crumpled, weathered hut.

locations.name: Lake Ellior
locations.description: Largest lake on Obojima. The Temple of Shoom rises from its depths.

locations.name: Tellu & Scale School
locations.description: Sword school on the northern coast of the Gift of Shuritashi.

locations.name: The Crawling Canopy
locations.description: A massive mobile forest that wanders the Gale Fields. Contains the hidden Wicked Wizard Tavern.

locations.name: Lilywin (Ruins)
locations.description: Remnant roads mark the former nakudama capital city, now lost to the Gale Fields.

locations.name: Blue Back Lake
locations.description: Lake at the base of Opal Falls, fed by the waterfall. The Wallawalla River flows east from here.

locations.name: The Shade Wood
locations.description: A desaturated, abandoned section of woods near the eastern coastline. Corrupted.

locations.name: Whispering Forest
locations.description: A serene forest in the Coastal Highlands.

locations.name: Rumble Hill
locations.description: What appears to be a hill is actually a giant sleeping cat. Near Broken Bird Airfield.

locations.name: New Moon Lagoon
locations.description: The lagoon where Polewater Village sits on stilts.

locations.name: Corrupted Coastline
locations.description: Eastern coastline overtaken by the Corruption. Dangerous and twisted.

locations.name: Domain of the Lionfish King
locations.description: Underwater realm of the self-proclaimed fish folk monarch in the Shallows.
